search_results.title: John H. Walton
search_results.snippet: John H. Walton (born 1952) is an Old Testament scholar. He is Professor Emeritus at Wheaton College and was a Moody Bible Institute professor previously.

search_results.title: John Walton, Ph.D.
search_results.snippet: John Walton, Ph.D. Professor of Old Testament Emeritus. Faculty Since: 2001, Emeritus status in 2023; Email: john.

search_results.title: Jonathan Lee Walton
search_results.snippet: Dr. Walton is trained as a social ethicist whose scholarship focuses on the intersection of evangelical Christianity, mass media, and political culture.
